ratings.question_text: Overall, how would you rate the workload of this course in comparison to other Yale courses you have taken?
What is your overall assessment of this course?
Do you expect to use this class for credit toward your major, or toward a pre-professional program?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize ECON 110 05 for a fellow student? Would you recommend ECON 110 05 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: Obviously, if you have made it this far in screenwriting, you should go for the whole thing and write a feature. Not for the un-initiated though...

Excellent class. You will have to write a full length screenplay so be prepared for that. Script pages are shorter than essay pages but with the word count of my screenplay it's equivalent to a 65 page essay so don't sign up for this class thinking it will be easier than a senior essay. Plus you have to come up with a story that lasts an hour and 1/2 to 2 hours so it's difficult.
Basically you spend the entire school year writing a full length screenplay. You also read and critique your classmates' screenplays as well as a few feature film screenplays.
I would recommend this class to someone seriously considering going into screenwriting.
